text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _ControlActReason
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-GenericUpdateReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-CombinedPharmacyOrderSuspendReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-MedicationOrderAbortReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-MedicationOrderReleaseReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-PatientProfileQueryReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-PharmacySupplyRequestRenewalRefusalReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-SupplyOrderAbortReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ControlActNullificationReasonCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-StatusRevisionRefusalReasonCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _MedicationOrderAbortReasonCodemedication order abort reason**Description:**Indicates the reason the medication order should be aborted.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _MedicationOrderReleaseReasonCodemedication order release reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that indicate why the prescription should be released from suspended state.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _PharmacySupplyRequestRenewalRefusalReasonCodepharmacy supply request renewal refusal reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that identifies why a renewal prescription has been refused.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _SupplyOrderAbortReasonCodesupply order abort reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that indicates why the prescription should no longer be allowed to be dispensed (but can still administer what is already being dispensed).

name: ControlActReason
title: ControlActReason
description: Identifies why a specific query, request, or other trigger event occurred.
